resourceGroupInformation.name: GPS
resourceGroupInformation.description: The official GPS resource from the DoD that can track you - I mean - you can track your position.

privacySetting.name: Find Location
privacySetting.description: May find your location. May maybe not.

privacySetting.name: Modify
privacySetting.description: Gives the permission to modify your location (physically).
